The following lists contain particulars of all British Merchant and Fishing Vesselscaptured, destroyed, damaged, or molested by.the enemy since the 31st July 1917. Vessels armed for offensive purposes are not included in these lists. Unless otherwisestated, all bearings given are magnetic. Crew and civilian passengers only are includedin column headed " Lives lost."I.
